gameshop.advance.interfaces.remote.factory

Interface ICassaRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ICassaRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interfaccia remota per esportare cassa sui client tramite Java RMI.
